metadata.name: User Added To Group With CA Policy Modification Access
metadata.comment: Monitor and alert on group membership additions of groups that have CA policy modification access

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(message) = lower('add member from group'))

output.summary: Monitor and alert on group membership additions of groups that have CA policy modification access

metadata.objective: False positive: User removed from the group is approved Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-infrastructure#conditional-access
